A

Action - Class in qlearning.client

Builds Agent objects using the Builder pattern.

An ExplorationFactor whose ExplorationFactor.shouldExplore(Number) will always return true.

Q

qlearning - package qlearning
A framework for applying the Q-learning technique to a problem space.
qlearning.agent - package qlearning.agent
Framework for an actor to perform a q-learning decision process.
qlearning.agent.executors - package qlearning.agent.executors
Strategies for a Agent to execute Actions.
qlearning.client - package qlearning.client
Base classes that must be implemented by this library's clients.
qlearning.domain - package qlearning.domain
Domain variables used in operation of the Q-Learning algorithm.
qlearning.domain.exploration - package qlearning.domain.exploration
Objects supporting the exploration of the problem space.
qlearning.domain.learning - package qlearning.domain.learning
Values that influence how quickly the system learns and forgets.
qlearning.domain.quality - package qlearning.domain.quality
Classes for representing and manipulating Quality values.
Quality - Class in qlearning.domain.quality
The learned value of a State-Action pair's potential for future Rewards.
Quality(Number) - Constructor for class qlearning.domain.quality.Quality
Create a Quality object with the given value.
QualityHashMap - Class in qlearning.domain.quality
A data structure that stores Quality values in a hashed form.
QualityHashMap() - Constructor for class qlearning.domain.quality.QualityHashMap
Constructs an empty QualityHashMap with a default number of expected total states (16) and a default number of expected actions per state (11).
QualityHashMap(int, int) - Constructor for class qlearning.domain.quality.QualityHashMap
Constructs an empty QualityHashMap with a specified number of expected total states and number of expected actions per state.
QualityMap - Interface in qlearning.domain.quality
An object that can store the Quality values of State-Action pairs.
QualityUpdater - Class in qlearning.domain.quality
Caches values that are needed by a QualityUpdateStrategy, but that do not change, to simplify that strategy's interface.
QualityUpdater(QualityMap, QualityUpdateStrategy, LearningRate, DiscountFactor) - Constructor for class qlearning.domain.quality.QualityUpdater
Create a new QualityUpdater.
QualityUpdateStrategy - Interface in qlearning.domain.quality
A strategy for getting the next Quality value after one learning iteration.

R

RandomExplorationStrategy - Class in qlearning.domain.exploration
A simple ExplorationStrategy which will choose a random Action some of the time.
RandomExplorationStrategy(ExplorationFactor) - Constructor for class qlearning.domain.exploration.RandomExplorationStrategy
Create a new RandomExplorationStrategy with the given exploration factor.
RandomExplorationStrategy(ExplorationFactor, Random) - Constructor for class qlearning.domain.exploration.RandomExplorationStrategy
Create a RandomExplorationStrategy that uses the given exploration factor and source of randomness to determine whether or not to explore.
reset() - Method in class qlearning.agent.Agent
Remove recent history from this object, so that it does not associate the next State with the previous Step.
Reward - Class in qlearning.domain.learning
The desirability of a certain state.
Reward(Number) - Constructor for class qlearning.domain.learning.Reward
Create a Reward with the given value.

setQualityUpdateStrategy(QualityUpdateStrategy) - Method in class qlearning.agent.AgentBuilder
Set the QualityUpdateStrategy that this builder will give to its resulting Agent to update Quality values as it learns.
shouldExplore(Number) - Method in class qlearning.domain.exploration.ExplorationFactor
Test a value against this factor to see if exploration should happen.
State - Class in qlearning.client
A condition that you want to reward or discourage the system from arriving at, and all of the gridworld.actions that it is possible to take while in this condition.
State() - Constructor for class qlearning.client.State
 
StateActionQuality - Class in qlearning.domain.quality
A triplet of a State, Action, and Quality of that pair.
StateActionQuality(State, Action, Quality) - Constructor for class qlearning.domain.quality.StateActionQuality
Create a StateActionQuality triplet with the given Quality value.
Step - Class in qlearning.agent
A single State-Action pair choice made by an Agent during one iteration of its algorithm.
Step(State, Action) - Constructor for class qlearning.agent.Step
Create a Step containing the given State and Action.
